title: Compare: Visual polish and result reveal animation
description: Apply special visual treatment to the Compare page as the hero feature. Implement dramatic result reveal, animated regression/success banners, and ensure the pass/fail state is immediately clear and emotionally resonant.
acceptance_criteria: Result reveal: staggered fade-in animation (0.5s total) when comparison completes
REGRESSION banner: red, shadow-xl, slides down with subtle bounce, impossible to miss
PASS banner: green, celebratory, optional subtle confetti effect
Regression cards: sorted by severity, color-coded left border, animated score bars
Score delta bars show baselineâ†’candidate with animated transition
Side-by-side score visualization with threshold line
Overall delta prominently displayed with directional arrow
'Safe to merge!' text for passing comparisons
Hover states on regression/improvement cards (elevate on hover)
Loading state shows meaningful skeleton (not just spinner)
implementation_notes: Use CSS animations for reveal sequence
Consider framer-motion for more complex orchestration
Test emotional response: regression should feel alarming, pass should feel safe
Score bar animation: fill from left to right over 300ms
Confetti: use canvas-confetti or similar (10-20 particles, subtle)
This is THE feature - spend extra time on polish
